hero.description: Be part of the wallet's tokenization before the official launch. Get early access and a better price, just $15 per token (only 200,000 tokens available).

what_is.title: WHAT IS BLONECT?
what_is.description: Blonect is a multichain wallet built on Uni2Chain. This wallet integrates crypto, NFTs, social, gaming and DeFi into one seamless experience, fully decentralized.

features.title: FEATURES OF BLONECT
list_left: Multichain, compatible with Uni2Chain, BNB Chain, Ethereum, Solana, Polygon and Bitcoin.
list_right: Send and receive crypto with simple steps
Send crypto via phone number or email, even if the recipient doesn't have a wallet yet

rewards.title: REWARD EMISSION BREAKDOWN
rewards.subtitle: Own a share of the wallet's real economic engine.
rewards.description: Once tokenized, Blonect will distribute a portion of all wallet transaction fees to token holders - turning users into stakeholders.

features.title: Priority access at $15/token
features.description: Get in before the public, secure your tokens at pre-launch price.

features.title: Verified whitelist = early investor perks
features.description: Exclusive bonuses reserved only for early holders.

features.title: Private onboarding to our global Web3 network
features.description: Get in before the public, secure your tokens at pre-launch price.

features.title: Ownership before launch = strategic edge
features.description: You're not just buying a token, you're owning a piece of the ecosystem before it goes live.
